additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Purified Water, Sucrose, Maltodextrin, Acidity Regulators (330, 331), Flavours, Tri-Potassium Citrate, Magnesium Sulphate, Sodium Chloride, Preservative (202), Calcium Lactate, Vitamins (C, B3, B5, B6, B12), Colour (102, 142).

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Average osmolality is 315milliOsmol/L. Drink 250mL every 15 minutes for hardcore sessions exceeding an hour. Your own needs could vary.

additionalProperty.name: Country Of Origin
additionalProperty.value: Manufactured in New Zealand or Australia from local and imported ingredients.

description: Maximus is for the hardest worker in the room. For the unpretentious men of action. We give you what you need so you can keep on keeping on!
name: Gamer Lime Sports Drink
